verses.text:
And the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*. And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; \add there was\add* no \w open|strong="H6555"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*.

And it came to pass at that \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, when \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \add was\add* laid \w down|strong="H7901"\w* in his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to wax \w dim|strong="H3544"\w*, \add that\add* he \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w see|strong="H7200"\w*;

And ere the \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* went \w out|strong="H3518"\w* in the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, where the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add*, and \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* was laid \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \add to sleep;\add*
That the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*: and he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Here \add am\add* I.

And he \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* unto \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Here \add am\add* \w I|strong="H2009"\w*; for thou \w calledst|strong="H7121"\w* me. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* not; lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*. And he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and lay \w down|strong="H7901"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* yet \w again|strong="H3254"\w*, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*. And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Here \add am\add* I; for thou didst \w call|strong="H7121"\w* me. And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* not, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

Now \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* did not \w yet|strong="H2962"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, neither was the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* yet \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* unto him.  +  r 3.7  t Now…: or, Thus did Samuel before he knew the \+nd LORD\+nd*, and before the word of the \+nd LORD\+nd* was revealed unto him *

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* the third \w time|strong="H7992"\w*. And he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Here \add am\add* I; for thou didst \w call|strong="H7121"\w* me. And \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w perceived|strong="H0995"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w child|strong="H5288"\w*.

Therefore \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w*: and it shall be, if he \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thee, that thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w*. So \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and lay \w down|strong="H7901"\w* in his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H3320"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* as at other \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*. Then \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*; for thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, Behold, I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, at which \w both|strong="H8147"\w* the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of every one that \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* it shall \w tingle|strong="H6750"\w*.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* I will \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* against \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* all \add things\add* which I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w concerning|strong="H0413"\w* his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: when I \w begin|strong="H2490"\w*, I will also make an \w end|strong="H3615"\w*.\f + \fr 3.12 \ft when…: Heb. beginning and ending\f*

For I have \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him that I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* for the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* which he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w*; because his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* made themselves \w vile|strong="H7043"\w*, and he \w restrained|strong="H3543"\w* them not.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft For I…: or, And I will tell him\f*\f + \fr 3.13 \ft vile: or, accursed\f*\f + \fr 3.13 \ft restrained…: Heb. frowned not upon them\f*

And therefore I have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, that the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of \w Eli’s|strong="H5941"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall not be \w purged|strong="H3722"\w* with \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* nor \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* to \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* the \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*.

Then \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Here \add am\add* I.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that \add the \+nd Lord\+nd*\add* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee? I pray thee \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \add it\add* not from me: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* do \w so|strong="H6213"\w* to thee, and more \w also|strong="H3254"\w*, if thou \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \add any\add* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* from me of all the \w things|strong="H1697"\w* that he \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft more also: Heb. so add\f*\f + \fr 3.17 \ft thing: or, word\f*

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him every \w whit|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w hid|strong="H3582"\w* nothing from him. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: let him \w do|strong="H6213"\w* what \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* him \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.\f + \fr 3.18 \ft every…: Heb. all the things, or, words\f*

¶ And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was with him, and did let none of his \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

And all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* even to \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* that \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \add was\add* \w established|strong="H0539"\w* \add to be\add* a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 3.20 \ft established: or, faithful\f*

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* himself to \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* by the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
